projects.title: TurtleBot3 ROS SLAM Navigation
projects.description: Real-time SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) implementation using TurtleBot3 robot with ROS. Demonstrates autonomous navigation, mapping, and localization in static environments using 2D laser scanner.
projects.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lierXbnl9KU?si=BYRMMzTC0-4oUUji" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.title: Depth Anything: State-of-the-Art Monocular Depth Estimation
projects.description: Implementation of Depth Anything, a single-image depth estimation model that outperforms MiDaS and ZoeDepth in zero-shot depth and metric depth estimation tasks. See how this breakthrough model transforms 2D images into detailed depth maps.

projects.title: Real-Time 360Â° Video Streaming with Insta360
projects.description: Built a real-time 360-degree video streaming system using Insta360 camera, WebRTC technology, and Linode server infrastructure. Experience immersive live broadcasting that brings viewers into the action from every angle.

projects.title: 4D Multi-Object Tracking for Autonomous Vehicles
projects.description: Advanced 4D Multi-Object Tracking system using KITTI dataset and deep learning models. This project extends 3D object detection with temporal tracking, enabling autonomous vehicles to understand dynamic environments in real-time.

projects.title: GLPDepth: Monocular Depth Estimation with KITTI Dataset
projects.description: Implementation of GLPDepth model for monocular depth estimation using the KITTI dataset. Features a global-local-global feature pyramid network that extracts multi-scale features and fuses them to predict accurate depth maps from single images.

projects.title: 3D Object Detection with PointRCNN and KITTI Dataset
projects.description: Custom PointRCNN model trained on the KITTI dataset for 3D object detection. This two-stage approach generates 3D region proposals from point clouds and refines them for precise object detection in autonomous driving scenarios.

projects.title: Visual SLAM Testing with ROS at UTA
projects.description: Real-world testing of ROS and Visual SLAM with a racecar at The University of Texas at Arlington. Features LiDAR and camera sensor fusion for autonomous navigation through obstacle courses without relying on lane markings.

projects.title: YOLOP: Real-Time Panoptic Driving Perception
projects.description: Training and implementation of YOLOP (YOLO Panoptic Driving Perception) on a custom highway dataset. This real-time model simultaneously detects and segments vehicles in a single forward pass for autonomous driving applications.

projects.title: Lightweight Hand Detection at 30FPS with 6MB Model
projects.description: Efficient hand and wrist detection system achieving 30 FPS with a compact 6MB model. Built on Ultralytics YOLOv8n with 3.2M parameters, demonstrating how to balance accuracy and performance for real-time applications.

projects.title: RTAB-Map Database Viewer and Localization
projects.description: Comprehensive demonstration of RTAB-Map's mapping and localization capabilities in complex environments. Shows how to visualize, optimize, and interact with collected map data using various odometry approaches and sensor configurations.
projects.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QAJaO51hcDo?si=XUP63Jyoab4-6T85" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

projects.title: Real-Time Appearance-Based Mapping with RTAB-Map
projects.description: Implementation of real-time appearance-based mapping using a single camera. Creates maps of unknown environments by extracting and matching visual features between consecutive frames for accurate pose estimation.

projects.title: First-Person Shooter Game in Unreal Engine 5
projects.description: Complete FPS game built with Unreal Engine 5 blueprints featuring dynamic shooting mechanics, timed gameplay, and scoring systems. Includes static and moving targets, main menu, and pause functionality for an engaging gaming experience.

projects.title: Autonomous Maze Navigation with Lego Mindstorms EV3
projects.description: Smart robot that navigates unknown mazes and cleans up colored blocks using Lego Mindstorms EV3. Uses color sensors for block recognition and ultrasonic sensors for wall detection and pathfinding through complex environments.

projects.title: Mercado Escolar: School Supplies E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce website built with React for purchasing school supplies online. Features product catalog, shopping cart, checkout system, and user authentication with different access levels for business and admin accounts.

projects.title: Installing Laravel on Ubuntu: Complete Setup Guide
projects.description: Step-by-step tutorial for installing PHP and Laravel on Ubuntu 20.04. Covers repository setup, package installation, and getting your first Laravel project running with PHP 8.1.12 and Laravel v9.40.1.

projects.title: Square Root Calculation Without Built-in Functions
projects.description: Implementation of the Newton-Raphson method for calculating square roots without using built-in sqrt() functions. Demonstrates iterative mathematical algorithms and numerical computation techniques in Python.

projects.title: Camera Calibration Challenge: Pitch and Yaw Estimation
projects.description: Solution to comma.ai's calibration challenge for estimating camera pitch and yaw angles in vehicle-mounted systems. Uses feature detection, matching, and robust estimation methods to compute camera motion from consecutive frames.

projects.title: LiDAR-Based Obstacle Avoidance for Autonomous Vehicles
projects.description: Reactive obstacle avoidance system for a 6WD robot vehicle using LiDAR sensing. Detects unknown obstacles through scan matching and automatically steers the vehicle away from potential collisions using real-time control algorithms.

projects.title: JavaScript Learning Projects: Budget Tracker and Pig Dice Game
projects.description: Two interactive JavaScript applications showcasing fundamental web development skills. Features a digital budget tracker for financial management and a fun pig dice game with scoring mechanics and user-friendly interfaces.

projects.title: Data Visualization with Dart Dataset and Python Scatter Plots
projects.description: Comprehensive guide to creating scatter plots using Python's PyPlot library with the Dart dataset. Learn how to visualize data relationships and create meaningful charts for data analysis and presentation.

projects.title: Knowledge Graph-Based Question Answering System
projects.description: Intelligent QA system that extracts entities from text and builds knowledge graphs for answering questions. Uses dependency parsing and entity extraction to handle "who," "what," "when," and "where" queries effectively.

projects.title: Knowledge Graph QA System: YouTube Presentation
projects.description: Complete walkthrough of building a knowledge graph representation system for question answering. Demonstrates entity extraction techniques and structured data approaches for providing accurate, concise answers to user queries.

projects.title: Installing Unreal Engine 4 on Arch Linux
projects.description: Comprehensive guide for setting up Unreal Engine 4 on Arch Linux. Covers installation steps, configuration requirements, and troubleshooting tips to get UE4 running smoothly on the Linux platform for game development.

projects.title: Mathematical Equation Solver: Exploring Different Approaches
projects.description: Analysis of various equation-solving methods and their implementations in Python. Explores different algorithmic approaches for solving complex mathematical equations with practical code examples and performance comparisons.

projects.title: Instagram Chat Backup Tool: Save Conversations Offline
projects.description: Python script for saving Instagram chat conversations in readable text format for offline access. Designed for personal chat backups with easy-to-use interface and organized output formatting.
